trends: There have been no other sightings in Sutter Creek
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: a very bright light apered then went dim and shot away
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was outside looking up at the stars (about 10:50 till 10:56pm)i watched a plane(jet airliner) crossing the sky from west to east(probably from sac\metro airport). all of the sudden a extremely bright light appeared rather close to the plane crossing the sky. it looked like it was off to the left(north) and kind of behind the plane. it was very bright and wight. it was much brighter than the lights that they use on airliners.i cant stress enough how bright and wight the light was. and i know that there where no other airplanes in the sky in the direction that i was looking(i was looking east north\east). the light did not move(at first) as far as i can tell, it only lasted for about maybe 10 to 15 seconds. and it was extremely bright. it looked like it was perty close. at first i thought it was a plane coming in to land at westover field in sutter creek ca. (about 2 miles south of me)but there was no sound at all,i could still here the airliner in the sky. and it was lined up wrong for a landing there. after about 10 to 15 seconds the light dimmed down but not out and took off towards the east south\east.it got dimmer than most of the stars in the sky in about 5 to 7 seconds as it was moving. i had to strain to see it once it finished moving. i still saw it heeding what looked like the east south\east when it was dim then it stopped and went the other direction(north) after around 5 seconds later i lost it . it went a good 8 fingers towards the north before i lost it. when it was dim it look like a satellite in the sky but when it turned to head the other direction i knew it was not a satellite. i saw no shape just wight, very bright light, it just appeared as far as i can tell. i go outside at night all the time to look at the night sky, i like to look for satellites and well just look at the sky ... i have seen lots and lots of satellites before, this was not one!!!!!! i have seen other things before too but you have to call me to talk about those,they are nothing big... but i'm still trying to figure it out, and till im sure it not something man made.... then i will type it out but i could use some help to figure it out so please give me a call thank you s.d.
